content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or opinions. However, different individuals may have different preferences on the type of worship that is effective in guiding their spiritual path. Some people may find that communal worship provides a sense of connection and support from a community of like-minded individuals, while others may prefer individual worship as it can offer a more personalized and contemplative experience. Ultimately, the effectiveness of worship in guiding one's spiritual path depends on many factors, including personal beliefs, values, and preferences.
